about_the_game:
Build the coziest village


In Frisia you start on an uninhabited Northsea island and are tasked with building a functional, yet cozy and beautiful little town. Inspired by the frisian architecture of the Dutch and German Northsea coast, Frisia aims to create a cozy gameplay experience in harmony with simple town-building and strategy game mechanics!

  • Construct a village for your villagers to live and work!
  • Beautify your village with cosmetic objects and nature elements and customize buildings to suit your personal taste
  • Work in harmony with the tides as the flood swallows the land regularly but also leaves behind valuable resources
  • Manage production chains to keep your villagers happy and produce the necessary goods for your growing village

You have fantasized about life in a picturesque little village by the sea? In Frisia you can let your imagination run free and create the coziest frisian village you could possibly think of!
